tool_description: This API streamlines real estate queries in UAE, enabling users to search for properties like apartments, villas, offices, and more, with detailed descriptions and images
name: Bayut com
title: Bayut com

api_list.name: agencies/get-listings
api_list.description: Get listing belonging to an agency

required_parameters.name: agencySlug
required_parameters.description: The value of hits -> slug field returned in …/agencies/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: rentFrequency
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following : monthly|yearly|weekly|daily
The parameter only takes effect if purpose is for-rent

optional_parameters.name: categorySlug
optional_parameters.description: |->Apartment<-|->Townhouse<-|->Villa<-|->Penthouse<-|->Hotel Apartment<-|->Villa Compound<-|->Residential Plot<-|->Residential Floor<-|->Residential Building<-|->Office<-|->Shop<-|->Warehouse<-|->Labour camp<-|->Commercial Villa<-|->Bulk Unit<-|->Commercial Plot<-|->Commercial Floor<-|->Commercial Building<-|->Factory<-|->Industrial Land<-|->Mixed Use Land<-|->Showroom<-|->Other Commercial<-|

optional_parameters.name: completionStatus
optional_parameters.description:
One of the following : completed|under-construction
This parameter only takes effect if purpose is for-sale

api_list.name: properties/list
api_list.description: List properties with options and filters

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Exact name fields are returned in …/autocomplete endpoints. Ex:  Abu Dhabi

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: |->Apartment<-|->Townhouse<-|->Villa<-|->Penthouse<-|->Hotel Apartment<-|->Villa Compound<-|->Residential Plot<-|->Residential Floor<-|->Residential Building<-|->Office<-|->Shop<-|->Warehouse<-|->Labour camp<-|->Commercial Villa<-|->Bulk Unit<-|->Commercial Plot<-|->Commercial Floor<-|->Commercial Building<-|->Factory<-|->Industrial Land<-|->Mixed Use Land<-|->Showroom<-|->Other Commercial<-|

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestions of locations by term or phrase

api_list.name: agencies/list
api_list.description: List agencies or search for agencies by name

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

api_list.name: properties/detail
api_list.description: Get detail information of a property

required_parameters.name: externalID
required_parameters.description: The value of externalID returned in …./properties/list endpoint
